Interface JExpress.Response

  • Enclosing class:
    JExpress

    public static interface JExpress.Response
    A HTTP response

      • json

        default void json(java.util.stream.Stream<?> stream)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Sends a JSON response with the correct 'Content-Type'.
        Parameters:
        stream - a stream of Object, toString will be called on each of them.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • json

        default void json(java.lang.String json)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Sends a JSON response with the correct 'Content-Type'.
        Parameters:
        json - a JSON string
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • send

        default void send(java.lang.String body)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Send a Text response. If the status is not defined 200 will be used. If the Content-Type is not defined, "text/html" will be used.
        Parameters:
        body - the text of the response
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
